article.title: ISC2 to Undergo Technical Refresh
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Corporation, Colorado Springs, Colorado, is being awarded a $9,199,396 cost-plus-fixed-fee, cost-plus-incentive-fee, cost-reimbursement contract to implement the technical refresh roadmap of Integrated Space Command and Control systems for the Communications Processing System.Â Electronic Systems Center, Peterson Air Force Base, Colorado, is the contracting activity.
